name: politico
text:
President Trump today vowed to "put pressure" on governors to reopen schools in the fall. 

"It's time to be open, it's time to stay open," said Trump. "And we will put out the fires as they come up, but we have to open our schools" https://t.co/G3HavxiJox https://t.co/L2dPpIMuVl
